name: Sonic EX: Modern Azure Hill Demo
name_original: Sonic EX: Modern Azure Hill Demo
description:
A part of my collection of old Sonic fangame builds.

Original Sonic games and assets Copyright Sega.

Controls:

Right arrow - Move right

Left arrow - Move left

Down arrow - Look down

Space - Jump

Down + Space - Spindash 

Right arrow while moving - Roll

Z - Lightspeed Dash

Fire Shield + Space + Space - Air Dash

Water Shield + Space + Space - Air Bounce

Electric Shield+Space+Space - Double Jump

Made with Sonic Revival Engine by TechnoSuperguy, Damizean, Rougeyoshi, Alex Z, Kain, and Chaos Rush.
